name: Parque dos Horrores
description:
Interdisciplinary work for Game Design course at Anhembi Morumbi University (2019/2). We used Unity Playground to do the programming, where I've worked as a producer, I've made the HUD, the menu, some sounds, level design, and also some programming on the Unity Playground.

Co-produced with Alexandre Rugolo, Gustavo Martins, Ígor Cabral, João Gozzi, Tiago Sabioni and Vitor Fortes.
